translation: 我：服务员，你们这里有青蛙腿吗？ 服务员：当然了，先生。 我：好的，那你跳过去给我拿瓶啤酒来。<|im_end|>

joke: It's comforting to know that the US government works the same way as a college student when it comes to deadlines... They both wait until the last minute, then get an extension.
translation: 知道美国政府和大学生在面对截止日期时的处理方式一样，真是让人感到安慰……他们都会拖到最后一刻，然后申请延期。<|im_end|>

joke: What did the man with The World's Largest Penis say when he had to have his legs amputated "Don't worry, I still have my third one."
translation: 患有世界最大阴茎的男子在双腿被截肢时说了什么？“别担心，我还有我的第三个呢。”<|im_end|>

joke: What's the worse thing to do to a blind person? Leave a plunger in the toilet
translation: 对盲人来说，最糟糕的事情是什么？在马桶里留下搋子。<|im_end|>

joke: When I was interviewed for a job in the chemistry department, they asked me if I had lab experience. I said I was more of a cat person.
translation: 当我申请化学系的工作时，他们问我是否有实验室经验。我说我更像个猫奴。<|im_end|>

joke: Two skeptics walk into a bar.. I'd tell you what happens next but noone knows
translation: 两个怀疑论者走进一家酒吧。关于接下来发生了什么，没人知道所以我也不便多说。<|im_end|>

joke: Everytime you pull the trigger a bullet loses its job...HAHAHAHA! Because it gets FIRED. HAHAHA! *I'm in tears*
translation: 每次你扣动扳机，一颗子弹就失去了工作……哈哈哈哈哈！因为它被发射了。哈哈哈！*我笑死了*<|im_end|>

joke: It would be great to be born on Earth and die on Mars. Preferably not on the point of impact.
translation: 最好是在地球上出生，在火星上死去。最好不是在撞击点上。<|im_end|>

joke: Descartes walks into the bar. The bartender asks him, "will you have your usual tonight?" Rene replies "I think not" and he disappears.
translation: 笛卡尔走进酒吧，酒保问他：“您今天还像平常一样点吗？”笛卡尔回答说：“我怀疑。”说完他就不见了。<|im_end|>

joke: Anyone want to hear my Human Centipede joke? Nah, I won't tell you it. It sucks ass.
translation: 有谁想听我关于《人皮兽》的笑话吗？不了，我还是不说了吧，那个笑话真的很烂。<|im_end|>

joke: My dog can predict when an earthquake is going to happen. But television doorbell versus actual doorbell baffles him every time.
translation: 我的狗能预测地震什么时候会发生。但是电视门铃和真正的门铃的区别每次都让他困惑。<|im_end|>

joke: My favorite knock knock joke. I need someone to start it ... Someone start the knock knock joke ...
translation: 我最喜欢的文字敲敲笑，我需要一个人开始……有人开始文字敲敲笑吗……<|im_end|>

joke: My Parents asked me what i wanted for christmas... I said i want something to wear and something to play with. So they got me a pair of pants with the pockets cut out.
translation: 我的父母问我圣诞节想要什么礼物……我说我想得到一些可以穿的东西和一些可以玩的东西。所以他们给我买了一条口袋被剪掉的裤子。<|im_end|>

joke: With 10K characters, I can finally get into great detail about how I'm not allowed at the company family picnic any more!
translation: 有了10K个字符，我终于可以详细说明为什么我不被允许参加公司家庭野餐了！<|im_end|>

joke: [at my funeral] So young, how did he die? He ran into oncoming traffic after walking past a group of adults saying the word "bae"
translation: （在我葬礼上）他那么年轻，怎么会死呢？他是在走过一群大人说“宝贝”（bae）之后，跑向了来往的车辆。<|im_end|>

joke: Stealing my little brother's (fellow Redditor) original joke, hope he sees it and is pissed. What do you get when you cross a pig and a Christmas tree...? A Porky-Pine
translation: 偷我弟弟（同为 redditor）的原创笑话，希望他看到会生气。当一只猪和一棵圣诞树结合会得到什么？一头香猪（Porky-Pine，Porky 意为肥猪，Pine 松树，结合了猪和圣诞树的元素）<|im_end|>

joke: I lost my virginity to a retarded girl last night. I wanted it to be special
translation: 我昨晚把童子之身给了一个智障的女孩。我当时想让它变得特别一点。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the biggest compliment you can pay at a gay bar? Pushing in somebody's stool.
translation: 在同性酒吧里你能给予的最大恭维是什么？为别人把凳子推好。<|im_end|>

joke: What's a pirate's favourite type of weaponry? It's ARRRtillery! bonus: A pirate's favourite melee weapon? A scimitARRR
translation: 海盗最喜欢什么武器类型？是ARRTillery（炮火）！额外笑话：海盗最喜欢的近战武器是什么？是弯刀ARRR（音似“海盗”）！<|im_end|>

joke: Hey, who did you vote for?... I wrote in Michael J. Fox. I think he can really shake things up!
translation: 嘿，你投谁的票了？……我写的是迈克尔·J·福克斯，我觉得他能真正地带来改变！<|im_end|>

joke: I once had a crippiling masturbation addiction... ...now i have a sex addiction, could you say my addiction has gotten out of hand?
translation: 我曾经沉迷于自慰，无法自拔…… 现在我有了性瘾，你能说我的瘾已经失控了吗？<|im_end|>

joke: *Guy tries giving me his phone number* Me: Oh no thank you. I already have one
translation: guy想给我他的电话号码：哦不，谢谢，我已经有电话了。<|im_end|>

joke: I'm glad it's the thought that counts because I spend all day thinking about the shit I should be doing.
translation: 我很高兴心意最重要，因为一整天我都在想着那些我本应该去做的事情。<|im_end|>

joke: A man balks in a war He is discharged for dereliction of duty and takes up drinking.
translation: 一个男人在战争中退缩了，他因玩忽职守被开除，然后开始酗酒。<|im_end|>

joke: Yo mama so lazy she thinks a two-income  family is where yo daddy has two jobs.
translation: 你妈妈那么懒，她认为双收入家庭是指你爸爸有两份工作。<|im_end|>

joke: Breaking Bad is my favorite documentary about what it takes to be an entrepreneur while balancing family life.
translation: 《绝命毒师》是我最喜欢的纪录片，它讲述了一个人在平衡家庭生活的同时成为企业家所需要的一切。<|im_end|>

joke: What did the gay guy say to his lover when they were going on vacation? "Hey, can you help me pack my shit?"
translation: 那个gay男生在他和他的爱人去度假的时候说了什么？“嘿，你能帮我打包我的东西吗？”<|im_end|>

joke: Coworker: Stop Me: collaborate and listen Coworker: Don't Me: you forget about me Coworker: Hey! Me: teacher, leave them kids alone
translation: 同事：别了我：合作然后听我的同事：不要了我：你别忘了我同事：嘿！我：老师，别闹了<|im_end|>

joke: What's an extroverted accountant? One who looks at your shoes while he's talking to you instead of his  own.
translation: 一个外向的会计师是什么？是一个在和你说话时看你的鞋子而不是他自己鞋子的人。<|im_end|>

joke: Dear President Obama, I've got a joke for you... I texted it to Angela Merkel. Did you... *get it*?
translation: 亲爱的奥巴马总统，我有个笑话想告诉你……我发短信给默克尔了。你有没有… *领会* 呢？<|im_end|>

joke: Sorry, but breaking up with you on facebook was the best way of letting all your friends know I'm available.
translation: 对不起，但在我脸书上和你分手是让我所有朋友知道我单身的最佳方式。<|im_end|>

joke: I don't understand women. I also don't understand how a car works but I still drive it.
translation: 我搞不懂女人，我也搞不懂汽车是怎么工作的，但我还是开车。<|im_end|>

joke: What are the 3 stages of sex after marriage? Tri-weekly Try Weekly and Try Weakly
translation: 结婚后的性生活分为三个阶段：周周有、试试周和试弱周。<|im_end|>

joke: My girlfriend is great in bed... But I don't know how my best friend would know that.
translation: 我的女朋友在床上很棒……但我不知道我最好的朋友是怎么知道的。<|im_end|>

joke: [Justice League HQ] SUPERMAN: Looks like Batman is hungry tonight MOTHMAN: [visibly sweating] I think I'll just fight daytime crimes
translation: [正义联盟总部] 超人：看来蝙蝠侠今晚饿了。 蝙蝠侠：照明人开始出汗了 我想我还是去白天行侠仗义吧。<|im_end|>

joke: My favourite word is snigger It allows me to be sracist without speople sthinking I'm a sbad sperson

joke: How do you hide an elephant in a fridge? You remove his slippers and open the door . You put him inside. You close the door and take the slippers away.
translation: 怎么把大象藏在冰箱里？你先把它脱了鞋，打开冰箱门。然后把大象放进去。关上冰箱门，再把鞋拿走。<|im_end|>

joke: Pete and repeat are in a boat Pete and repeat are brothers. Pete falls overboard, who's left?
translation: 皮特和重复在一条船上，皮特和重复是兄弟。皮特掉进水里了，谁留下了？（提示：这是一个玩文字的游戏，重复的意思是重复，也是人名。）<|im_end|>

joke: What did Arnold Schwarzenegger say to the gym manager when he was joining a new gym? I'll re-rack.
translation: 阿诺德·施瓦辛格在加入一个新的健身房时对经理说了什么？我会把器械放回原位的。<|im_end|>

joke: Right now a group of women at a baby shower are simultaneously saying, "Awwww..." while some knocked up chick holds up a tiny pair of socks.
translation: 现在一群女人在婴儿洗礼派对上同时说“啊哦~”因为某个怀孕的女人举起了一双婴儿袜。<|im_end|>

joke: Gentlemen test At least most tests have the decency to ask me my name, before they fuck me.
translation: 先生们，做个测试吧。至少大多数测试在我被它们“利用”之前还有礼貌地问我的名字。<|im_end|>

joke: I went in to hospital for an operation... I asked the anaesthetist if I could administer the needle myself, and he said: "Sure, knock yourself out".
translation: 我去医院做手术……我问麻醉师是否可以自己注射针剂，他说：“当然，随便你。”<|im_end|>

joke: A piece of shit walks into a bar It's my dad... My dad is a piece of shit.
translation: 一团屎走了进酒吧，那是我爸爸……我爸爸就是一团屎。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the last thing that tickle-me elmo gets before he leaves the factory? Two test tickles

joke: What do you get when you cross a sheep stealer with royalty? Mutton Looter King
translation: 当你把一个偷羊的人和皇室成员结合起来会得到什么？答：羊贼国王<|im_end|>

joke: An Indian redditor gets an arranged marriage. He turns to his partner and says: "Thanks for the gold, kind stranger!"
translation: 一个印度 redditor（Reddit 用户）通过包办婚姻结婚了。他转向他的伴侣说：“谢谢你的金币，善良的陌生人！”<|im_end|>

joke: What do you tell a woman with two black eyes? ..........Nothing you've already told her twice!
translation: 你跟一个眼睛淤青的女人说什么？...............什么都不用说，你已经对她重复说了两次了！<|im_end|>

joke: I'd kill for a microwave that plays Europe's "The Final Countdown" during the last 30 seconds.
translation: 我愿意杀死某人换来一个微波炉，在最后30秒的时候播放欧佩尔乐队的《最终倒计时》。<|im_end|>

joke: Did you hear about the skeleton who didn't go to prom? He had no body to go with.
translation: 你听说了吗，那根不去参加毕业舞会的骨头？他没有人可以一起去。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you call it when a jugaloo sleeps with his girlfriend after a fight? Make up sex.
translation: 吵架后一个朱洛和他的女朋友同床了，你管这叫和好如初的性爱。<|im_end|>

joke: Kids are like farts. You don't mind your own, but others peoples are just unbearable
translation: 孩子们就像放屁，你不在乎自己的，但别人的你就觉得无法忍受。<|im_end|>

joke: Over the past year, my sexual fetishes have been slowly getting more perverse. But it wasn't until I spanked a statue that I realised I'd hit rock bottom.
translation: 在过去的一年里，我的性癖好逐渐变得越来越扭曲。但直到我抽了一尊雕像后，我才意识到自己已经堕落到谷底了。<|im_end|>

joke: I milked the cow "We don't have a cow" the neighbors' cow then "Their cat?" Pretty sure it was a cow he was saying moo "Meow" Ah shoot
translation: 我把邻居的牛挤了奶 “我们没有牛” 邻居说 “他们的猫？” 确定他说的是“哞哞”而不是“喵喵” “喵喵” 哎呀<|im_end|>

joke: Dear Shirtless Guy in his Profile Pic, You REALLY want to impress girls? Get a job & pose in front of your cubicle.
translation: 亲爱的只穿衬衣的家伙（指对方的个人资料照片），你真的想给女孩留下深刻印象吗？去找个工作，在你的工位前摆个姿势吧。<|im_end|>

joke: The IRA have been fighting for Irish reunification since the 70s. . . All they needed to do was vote for the Conservatives.
translation: 译文：IRA（爱尔兰共和军）自20世纪70年代以来一直在为爱尔兰统一而战……他们所需要做的就是投票给保守党。<|im_end|>

joke: How many Reddit admins does it take to change a lightbulb? None, they like to keep the mods in the dark.
translation: Reddit管理员需要几个才能换一个灯泡？一个也不需要，他们喜欢让 moderators 处于黑暗中。<|im_end|>

joke: Facebook buys Instagram for one billion?!? Idiots!! They could have downloaded it from the app store for .99 cents..
translation: Facebook花了10亿美元收购Instagram？！！白痴！！他们本可以花0.99美分从应用商店下载它就行了..<|im_end|>

joke: I may not be getting laid tonight, but I'm definitely banging my snooze button in the morning.
translation: 我今晚可能没有机会发生性关系了，但明天早上我一定会不停地按 snooze 键（ Snooze 键是指闹钟的延时闹铃键）。<|im_end|>

joke: I want to make a series about the murder of an airline crew but I still have to shoot the pilot.
translation: 我想做一个关于航空机组谋杀的系列剧，但我还是得“干掉”那个飞行员。<|im_end|>

joke: My friend always wanted to work in animation, but never got past the interview He just couldn't understand the difference between a professional "colorist" and a professional "racist"
translation: 我的朋友一直想从事动画行业，但面试总是过不去。他就是不明白专业“上色师”和专业“种族主义者”之间的区别。<|im_end|>

joke: [sees a zebra for the first time] What's up with that horse? [sees a giraffe for the first time] Okay, what the hell is going on today?
translation: （第一次看到斑马）那匹马怎么了？（第一次看到长颈鹿）好吧，今天这是怎么回事？<|im_end|>

joke: so as I went in to vote this morning, an old lady told me to make sure I voted for the candidate that could make change. Boy, is my bank teller going to be surprised!
translation: 所以今天我去投票的时候，一位老太太告诉我一定要投能“做出改变”的候选人。我的银行柜员可要大吃一惊了！<|im_end|>

joke: You're so fat and unfunny... that the only punchlines you have are stained on your shirt.
translation: 你太胖也没趣了……以至于你身上的笑话都沾在你的衬衫上了。<|im_end|>

joke: Glue is weird it's all like hey I want to stick these pieces of paper together wait I have an idea hand me that dead horse

joke: Why are women and children evacuated first in a disaster? So we can think about a solution in silence
translation: 为什么灾难发生时先撤离妇女和儿童？为了让我们能安静地想想办法。<|im_end|>

joke: Waiting for the day when a girl finally says that I'm "the one," but isn't talking to a police officer.
translation: 等待那一天，当一个女孩终于说我是“唯一的一个”，但她说这话的时候不是在跟警察讲话。<|im_end|>

joke: Some people say Glenn Frey got pneumonia from the cold... But that can't be true because he said the Heat is On.
translation: 有些人说格伦·弗雷是由于受凉得了肺炎……但那不可能是真的，因为他自己说过《热力四射》。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the best part about having sex with 23 year olds? There's 20 of them. (Works better in person)
translation: 和23岁的人发生性关系最好的地方是什么？因为他们还是20岁的心态。<|im_end|>

joke: My love for you is like a fart. Everything about it is powered by my heart.
translation: 我对你的爱就像放屁，一切都由我的心驱动。<|im_end|>

joke: What did the Mexican gang member say when two large houses fell on him during an earthquake? Get off me, homes.
translation: 地震时，两座大房子压在一个墨西哥帮派成员身上，他说什么？滚开我，宅男。注：homies是buddy（兄弟）的意思，这里取谐音“homes”并结合中文梗进行了翻译。<|im_end|>

joke: I once bought an e. e. cummings poem collection.. It was the worst game of Mad Libs ever.
translation: 我曾经买过一本e.e. cummings的诗集。那是一次最糟糕的接龙游戏。<|im_end|>

joke: Why is it that the more numbers someone has in their e-mail address, the less I respect them?
translation: 为什么一个人的电子邮件地址里数字越多，我越不尊重他？<|im_end|>

joke: If you ever need help learning C++, I can give you some pointers. And you can keep me as a reference.
translation: 如果你需要学习C++的帮助，我可以给你一些建议。你可以把我当作参考。<|im_end|>

joke: What have you done wrong if the wife keep complaining when you try to watch TV in the living room? You made the chain too long in the kitchen.
translation: 你在客厅试图看电视时，妻子一直抱怨，这意味着你什么做错了？ 意思是你在厨房给她拴的链子太长了。<|im_end|>

joke: Don't buy whitening toothpaste It says guaranteed whiteness in 14 days. 15 days have come and gone... and I am still asian.
translation: 不要买美白牙膏，它说14天内保证美白。15天过去了……我还是黄种人。<|im_end|>

joke: Simba - "welcome to... The bone zone" Nala - "the what?" Simba - "elephant graveyard. I said elephant graveyard"
translation: (simba:欢迎来到... 骨头区) (nala:什么?) (simba:大象墓地。我说的是大象墓地)<|im_end|>

joke: How are doctors so well tempered even under heavy stress? They have a lot of patients
translation: 医生在巨大的压力下怎么能保持如此好的心态？因为他们有很多病人。<|im_end|>

joke: I wonder if dog's had facebook, would they put our picture as their profile picture.
translation: 我想如果狗也有Facebook，它们会用我们的照片作为它们的头像吗。<|im_end|>

joke: Why are Native Americans the most successfull strippers? Because when they dance, they make it rain.
translation: 为什么美洲原住民是最成功的脱衣舞者？因为当他们跳舞时，他们会引来“下雨”（意指大量的钱如雨点般落下）。<|im_end|>

joke: My ex-girlfriend was a slut. She bust more nuts than a pistachio junkie. edit: Going through a potential breakup, so if you see this, this isnt about you, babe. Dont leave me, please.
translation: 我前女友是个荡妇，她跟我朋友说的比一个吃 pistachio（ Pistachio在这里是指夏威夷果，但更常见的翻译是开心果，这里为了保持原文的双关，我们保留 pistachio 的直译）成瘾的人还要多。编辑：我可能正经历一段分手，所以如果你看到这个信息，这不是关于你的，宝贝。不要离开我，请。<|im_end|>

joke: Why Did the Ebola Patient Cross the Road? Trick question. There are no roads in Africa.
translation: 埃博拉患者为什么过马路？这是一个陷阱问题，在非洲没有路。<|im_end|>

joke: ME: Haha you can tell them any name and they have to say it BARISTA: I have a latte for "A Person Who Deserves Love"? ME [crying]: Hahaha
translation: 我：哈哈，你可以随便编个名字，他们都会读出来。BARISTA：有一个叫做“一个值得被爱的人”的拿铁。我：哈哈哈（笑哭了）<|im_end|>

joke: Peter Pan escaped the adult world... ...by becoming an alcoholic. He goes by Peter the Panhandler now.
translation: 彼得·潘通过成为酒鬼逃过了成人的世界，现在人们叫他彼得·流浪汉。<|im_end|>

joke: My Grandfather had the heart of a lion and a lifetime ban from the zoo.

translation: 为什么暴风突击队员决定买iPhone？因为他找不到他要找的Droid。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the difference between a drug dealer and a hooker? A hooker can wash her crack and sell it again.
translation: 一个毒贩和一个妓女的区别是什么？妓女可以洗洗她的可卡因然后再次卖掉。<|im_end|>

joke: When I say I'm gonna take a nap, it means I'm gonna go on my computer for three hours.
translation: 当我这么说我要去睡觉一会儿的时候，其实意味着我要连续上网三小时。<|im_end|>

joke: I love watching two girls meet each other. It's easily the most fake thing I have ever seen.
translation: 我喜欢看两个女孩互相见面的场景。这可能是我见过的最假的事情了。<|im_end|>

joke: Pokemon Go has really improved my life... I used to always get in trouble for playing with my balls outside.
translation: Pokemon Go真的大大改善了我的生活……我过去总是因为在外面玩球而惹上麻烦。<|im_end|>

joke: I showed up at Disney headquarters uninvited I said I was there for a Rogue One cameo That's how I learned the security guards have Tasers
translation: 我未经邀请就来到了迪士尼总部，我说我是来客串《侠盗一号》的，就是那时候我知道了他们的保安配备了泰瑟枪。<|im_end|>

joke: Why did the Canadian cross the road? Because that's the direction his car was sliding.
translation: 为什么加拿大人过马路？因为他的车在那个方向滑行。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you do when you find Michael J. Fox in your hot tub? .....Add your laundry.
translation: 当你发现迈克尔·J·福克斯在你的热水浴缸里时，你应该做什么？……加点你的洗衣粉。<|im_end|>

joke: Today I learned two things: 1. Build-A-Bear Workshop only lets you stuff fake animals 2. Mall security guards get to use real handcuffs
translation: 今天我学到了两件事：1. Build-A-Bear Workshop（一个可以自己动手做毛绒玩具的店铺）只让你填充假动物 2. 商场保安可以使用真正的手铐<|im_end|>

joke: Why do elephants have 4 feet? Because in the animal kingdom 6 inches just wont do
translation: 为什么大象有四条腿？因为在动物界，六英寸是不够的。<|im_end|>

joke: A blind guy walks into a bar... ...then a table, then a chair, then another chair...
translation: 一个盲人走进一家酒吧……然后撞到了一张桌子，一把椅子，又是一把椅子……<|im_end|>

joke: I bought a muzzle for my pet duck. Nothing flashy, but it fits the bill.
translation: 我为我的宠物鸭子买了一个口套。没有什么花哨的，但正好符合它的账单。（此处“符合它的账单”是双关语，英文中“符合账单”为“fits the bill”，同时也指鸭子的嘴巴）<|im_end|>

joke: There are plenty of fish in the sea. Sometimes you just need a really big fishing rod.
translation: 海里有的是鱼，有时候你只需要一根真的很大的钓鱼竿。<|im_end|>

joke: If I had a penny for every Donald Trump joke, I would have a small loan of one million dollars
translation: 要是每有一个关于唐纳德·特朗普的笑话我就得到一便士，我就会有一笔一百万美元的小贷款。<|im_end|>

joke: Retweet if you're naughty! Star if you love Jesus! Reply if you'd like to meet him!
translation: 转发如果你是坏孩子！点赞如果你爱耶稣！回复如果你想见他！<|im_end|>

joke: Woke up this morning with a pillow over my face, hearing someone muttering "...it would be so easy..."
translation: 早上醒来时发现枕头捂在脸上，听到有人嘟囔着「……真是简单啊……」<|im_end|>

joke: When are they going to drug test the audience of "The Price Is Right."? No one should be that happy.
translation: 他们什么时候会对“价格猜猜猜”（The Price Is Right）的观众进行药检？没有人会高兴到那种程度的。<|im_end|>

joke: Why don't they have a WHITE history month?? Why don't they have NON-handicapped parking spaces? Why's there no cemetery for ALIVE people??
translation: 为什么没有白色的历史月？为什么没有非残疾人的停车位？为什么没有活人的墓地？<|im_end|>

joke: The Lord said unto John, "Come forth and be awarded eternal life" John came fifth and was awarded a toaster
translation: 上帝对约翰说：“前来接受永生吧。” 约翰得了第五名，获得了一台烤面包机。<|im_end|>

joke: Why does Anna's mom encourage her daughter to experiment with sexuality? Because she lives bicuriously through others .
translation: 为什么安娜的妈妈鼓励她的女儿尝试不同的性取向？因为她通过别人对异性、同性以及双性都好奇。<|im_end|>

joke: *at a pizza buffet in the Midwest* Me: excuse me, can you please make a vegetarian pizza? Him: Sure! What kind of meat do you want on that?
translation: 在一个中西部的比萨自助餐厅里 我：对不起，请问你能做一个素食比萨吗？ 服务员：当然！你要放什么肉呢？<|im_end|>

joke: What is it called when you are on the edge of WiFi signal range? Router Limits!
translation: 当你处于WiFi信号范围的边缘时，这种情况叫作：路由器限值！<|im_end|>

joke: Year 2142: Meat eaters have died out. Vegans survive. 2143: Everyone is dead b/c the vegans couldn't tell anyone else that they were vegan.
translation: 2142年：吃肉的人灭绝了，素食者幸存下来。2143年：所有人都死了，因为素食者没有告诉其他人他们不能吃肉。<|im_end|>

joke: My new years resolution is to have more sex! I Haven't told my cellmate yet though
translation: 我的新年决心是增加性生活！不过我还没告诉我的狱友呢。<|im_end|>

joke: Why do lawyer's suits never have pants pockets? Because their hands are always in someone else's!
translation: 为什么律师的西装从来都没有裤袋？因为他们的手总是放在别人的口袋里！<|im_end|>

joke: Go to racist joke, what's yours? Two unemployed Irishmen walk past a police notice board with "two black men wanted for rape" first one says "fucking niggers get all the best jobs"
translation: 去种族主义笑话板块，你的呢？两个失业的爱尔兰人走过一个有通缉令的警察告示板，上面写着“两名黑人男子因强奸案通缉”，其中一个人说：“这些该死的黑人总是能拿到最好的工作。”<|im_end|>

joke: If you believe the home alarm commercials, the first thing burglars do when they break into your home is smash your family pictures.
translation: 如果你相信家庭报警器的广告，那么小偷破门而入的第一件事就是砸你的全家福照片。<|im_end|>

joke: It's just sad how often I see zookeepers breaking their own 'Dont Feed the Animals' rule.
translation: 真是可悲，我经常看到动物园管理员违反他们自己制定的“不要喂动物”的规定。<|im_end|>

joke: Why were there only 49 contestants in the National Ebonics Beauty Pageant? Nobody wanted to wear the sash that says "Idaho".
translation: 为什么全国埃邦伊克选美大赛只有49名参赛者？因为没人愿意佩戴写着“爱达荷州”字样的绶带。<|im_end|>

joke: Scientists remain baffled as to why the people on the internet really like pictures of cats and cats doing things.
translation: 科学家们仍然困惑为什么网上的人们那么喜欢猫的照片，以及猫在做各种事情的照片。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you do with old cannon balls ? Give them to elephants to use as marbles !
translation: 你怎么处理旧炮弹呢？把它们给大象当玻璃球玩！<|im_end|>

joke: Why is Saturn like your balls?? Because it is in between jupeter an your anus.
translation: 为什么土星像你的睾丸？因为它的位置在木星和你的肛门之间。<|im_end|>

joke: I like Tuesday simply because it is literally the furthest from next Monday I can possibly be.
translation: 我喜欢星期二，仅仅是因为在实际上它离下一个星期一最远。<|im_end|>

joke: I tried googling Wiz Khalifa ... But all I found was MIa Khalifa peeing .
translation: 我在谷歌上搜索了Wiz Khalifa……但找到的只有Mia Khalifa的小便照片。<|im_end|>

joke: I am an expert at making balloon animals. May I interest you in a hyphen or a pickle?
translation: 我是一名制作气球动物的专家。您想要一根肉桂卷还是一根夹子呢？<|im_end|>

joke: What happened when the girl dressed as a spoon left the Halloween party ? No one moved. They couldn't stir without her.
translation: 当打扮成勺子的女孩离开万圣节派对时发生了什么？没有人动弹。没有她他们无法搅拌。<|im_end|>

joke: What's the difference between wild Iranian Ossetra caviar and my penis? One is a delicacy (Deh-Lih-Cuh-See) and the other is a delicady (Deh-Lih-Cuh-Dee) Edit: The D
translation: 野生伊朗奥西特拉鱼子酱和我的阴茎有什么区别？一个是佳肴（Deh-Lih-Cuh-See），另一个是佳草（Deh-Lih-Cuh-Dee）。注：发音的区别在于“佳肴”和“佳草”。<|im_end|>

joke: Who are the 3 most famous black women? 1. Oprah 2. Aunt Jamima 3. Motha Fucka
translation: 谁是三位最著名的黑人女性？1. 奥普拉 2. 姨渣米（詹玛阿姨， pancakes & waffles 饼屋的商标人物）3. 母禽兽<|im_end|>

joke: Why does Darkwing Duck wear a mask? You are a duck. No one could identify you without describing every other duck on earth.
translation: 为什么暗翼鸭要戴面具？因为你是一只鸭子。如果没有面具，别人只能通过描述地球上每一只其他鸭子来试图认出你。<|im_end|>

joke: A bird pooped on my head today...Am I gonna die? I mean, I'm kinda worried about getting sick from it but mostly I hope this made someone's day.
translation: 今天有一只鸟在我头上拉屎……我会死吗？其实我是有点担心会因此生病，但更多的是希望这个举动能让某个人开心一下。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you call a man with no arms and no legs, lying in a ditch? Phil
translation: 一个没有胳膊没有腿的人躺在沟里叫什么？Phil（因为他说不了话，只能发出“菲”的声音）<|im_end|>

joke: Get a big metal box, label it "TIME CAPSULE" and take a big dump in it so people know what 2011 was like.
translation: 弄一个大金属盒子，在上面贴上“时间舱”的标签，然后在里面拉一泡屎，这样人们就知道2011年是什么样的了。<|im_end|>

joke: Well, I had to break up with the baker i've been dating She was just too kneady
translation: 好吧，我不得不和我交往的面包师分手了，她实在太“ kneady”了。<|im_end|>

joke: You can't keep eating people's lunches from the break room & blaming the Taliban. A lot of what you've been stealing is pork for one thing.
translation: 你不能总是偷同事放在休息室的午餐，然后诬陷塔利班干的。再说你偷的大多是猪肉，这也不符合实际情况。<|im_end|>

joke: My wife says she's leaving me because of my obsession with karaoke. I said "Fine, go on now go, walk out the door, just turn around now, because your not welcome anymore...."
translation: 我妻子说她要离开我，因为我太迷恋卡拉OK了。我说：“好，你现在走吧，走出去，然后转过身来，因为你不再受欢迎了……”<|im_end|>

joke: Q. What does a woman's asshole do when she is having an orgasm? A. He is usually home with the kids!
translation: 问题：当一个女人达到高潮时，她的肛门在干什么？答案：它通常在家里照看孩子们！<|im_end|>

joke: What did the farmer say when the police found the gate from the public footpath in his barn and accused him of stealing? That's not my stile.
translation: 农夫说了什么？当警察在他的谷仓里发现了从公共小道上移走的栅栏，并且指控他偷窃时，他说：“那不是我的栅栏，是路标。”注：stile在英语中有“栅栏”的意思，但在这里取其“步道栅栏”的意思，即路标。<|im_end|>

joke: Now marriage can be between any two people who are misguided enough to start a life together in New Jersey.
translation: 现在结婚可以是任何两个糊涂到愿意在新泽西开始生活在一起的人。<|im_end|>

joke: A guy walks into a bar and says, "I'm going to shoot whoever slept with my wife"! A man shouts from the back, "You don't got enough bullets, bud"!
translation: 一个男人走进酒吧说：“我要枪毙和我老婆睡觉的人！”角落里有人喊道：“兄弟，你没带够子弹吧！”<|im_end|>

joke: Sometimes I'm depressed and then a girl stars one of my tweets and it's like YAAAAYYYY NEW GIRLFRIEND!!!!!
translation: 有时候我会感到沮丧，然后有个女孩转发了我的一条推特，这时就会感觉好像耶！找到了新女友一样！<|im_end|>

joke: The road to recovery from my addiction to sexual innuendos has been a long and hard one. But the end is in sight... I can see it coming.
translation: 从我对于性暗示上瘾的康复之路是一条漫长而艰难的道路。但终点已经近在眼前……我能看到它了。<|im_end|>

joke: Why is my Tetris highscore like my wife? I beat both of them for fun.
translation: 为什么我的 tetris 最高分像我的妻子？因为我无聊的时候会欺负（击败）她们。<|im_end|>

joke: "Kids, grandma just had hip surgery so I need to warn you, she's not herself." *grandma struts in wearing skinny jeans and smoking an E-cig*
translation: 孩子们，奶奶刚刚做了髋关节手术，所以我得提醒你们，她现在不太正常。*结果奶奶穿着紧身牛仔裤，抽着电子烟神气地走了进来*<|im_end|>

joke: What do you call a motorcycle gang made up of ancient bisexual Norse monarchs? The bikings.
translation: 由古时候的双性恋 Norse 君主组成的摩托车帮派叫什么？就叫他们 bikings。<|im_end|>

joke: They called their son Honest Abe, because he was honest. They called their daughter Bloody Mary...
translation: 他们叫他们的儿子 Honest Abe（诚实的艾博），因为他很诚实。他们叫他们的女儿 Bloody Mary（血玛丽）……<|im_end|>

joke: Has this one ever been used? Why didn't the chicken cross the road? Because he was chicken. Alright.
translation: 这个冷笑话有人用过吗？为什么鸡过不了马路？因为它太胆小了。好吧。<|im_end|>

joke: Don't ask me for childcare advice unless you want nuggets of wisdom like "always punch holes in the box so they can breathe."
translation: 别问我育儿建议，除非你想听到这样的智慧：“总是要在盒子上打孔，好让他们透气。”<|im_end|>

joke: Why didn't the principal of the school for the blind allow his students to go duck-hunting? He knew that some of them wouldn't miss the blind ...
translation: 为什么盲人学校的校长不允许他的学生去打猎？他知道他们中的有些人不会“错过”盲人……<|im_end|>

joke: new iPhone 7 son: Daddy, buy me the new iPhone 7 Dad: What is the magic word? son: Natasha Dad: who is Natasha son: your lover Dad: do you need also a case?
translation: 儿子：爸爸，买我一个新出的iPhone 7吧。爸爸：你说 magic word（魔咒）。儿子： Natasha。爸爸： Natasha 是谁？儿子：你的女朋友。爸爸：你是要手机还是要手机壳？<|im_end|>

joke: Q: How many Honor Guards does it take to screw in a light bulb? A: 22 one to screw it in 21 to shoot the bulb.
translation: 问：需要多少名仪仗队队员才能换一个灯泡？答：22名，一个来换灯泡，其余21个来射击灯泡。<|im_end|>

joke: Cute girl: omg I love this bread [At the next table] Jesus: [loudly, holding up a slice of bread] so this is my body
translation: 可爱的女孩：哇哦，我好爱这个面包下一桌的耶稣：举起一片面包大声说：这就是我的身体<|im_end|>

joke: Did you hear about the Coldplay concert in China last weekend? It was all yellow.
translation: 你听说上周末Coldplay在中国的演唱会了吗？因为那儿全是黄牛票。<|im_end|>

joke: A hawk snatched my gf's chihuahua today.. ..it got rid of that annoying bitch for me in one fowl swoop.
translation: 今天一只鹰抓走了我女朋友的吉娃娃狗……它一次性为我解决了那个烦人的女人。<|im_end|>

joke: The people in this ad look 'indie' & remind me of myself. As a consumer this makes me feel good. Now I will purchase all their products
translation: 这广告里的人看起来很有“独立风格”，很像我本人。作为消费者，这让我感觉很好。现在我要买他们所有的产品。<|im_end|>

joke: The first rule of procrastination club is: Google some weird shit then take a nap.
translation: 拖延症俱乐部的第一条规矩是：先在谷歌搜一些奇怪的东西，然后躺下睡觉。<|im_end|>

joke: Sorry I pissed on the walls of your bathroom, but the flowery wall paper made me think I was outside.. Also you're out of Valium
translation: 对不起，我在你的浴室墙上尿了，但那花里胡哨的墙纸让我以为自己在外面。还有，你家没 Valium（注：Valium 是一种镇静剂，中文一般保留原文）了。<|im_end|>

joke: me: can i have a coke waiter: is Pepsi ok? me: ya pepsi's fine pepsi: i have a boyfriend
translation: 我：可以来一杯可乐吗？ 服务员：百事可乐可以吗？ 我：好吧，百事也可以。 百事：其实我有男朋友。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you call a black man who dies of heat exhaustion and a white guy that dies of a brain aneurysm? Different Strokes
translation: 一种人叫中暑身亡的黑人，另一种人叫脑动脉瘤身亡的白人，他们各有各的活法。<|im_end|>

joke: There is a new Barbie doll on the market - Funeral Home Barbie ...complete with hearse coffin and kicky little shroud
translation: 市场上出现了一个新的芭比娃娃——殡仪馆芭比，配有灵车、棺材和一条俏皮的小裹尸布。<|im_end|>

joke: Girlfriend: Did you fix the dishwasher? Me: Yup *girlfriend opens dishwasher revealing a monkey covered in bubbles, holding a scrub brush*
translation: 女友：你修好洗碗机了没？我：修好了*女友打开洗碗机，里面有一只浑身是泡沫、拿着 scrub brush 的猴子*<|im_end|>

joke: Some days I want to leave everything and just run away with him. Other days I want to own 3 baby dragons and be fireproof and naked.
translation: 有些日子我想离开一切，和他一起私奔。有些日子我又想拥有三条小龙，变得不怕火，而且赤身裸体。<|im_end|>

joke: What to toilet paper and the starship enterprise have in common? They both circle Uranus looking for Klingons
translation: 厕纸和企业号有什么共同点？它们都在环绕乌拉诺斯寻找克林贡人。<|im_end|>

joke: The soul weighs 21 grams. We know this because the Jurassic World film reels are 21 grams lighter than Jurassic Park
translation: 灵魂重21克，我们知道这一点是因为《侏罗纪世界》的电影胶片比《侏罗纪公园》的电影胶片轻21克。<|im_end|>

joke: If the lever on your toaster breaks off and your bread starts burning, can you pry it out with a butter knife? The answer may shock you.
translation: 如果你的烤面包机上的杠杆掉了，面包开始烧焦，你能用黄油刀把它拿出来吗？答案可能会让你大吃一惊。<|im_end|>

joke: [commercial] [man comes home after long day, opens front door and is attacked by 8 cats] MAN: There has to be a better way! Narrator: DOGS
translation: [广告] [一个男人经过漫长的一天回到家，打开前门就被8只猫攻击] 男人：一定有更好的办法！旁白：试试狗狗吧 描述：<|im_end|>

joke: There are few things more awkward on a blind date than looking up from your phone to realise she's left. She obviously wasn't blind at all.
translation: 在相亲时，从手机抬起头来发现她已经离开，这种情况相当尴尬。很明显，她根本就不是瞎的。<|im_end|>

joke: I don't know what disturbs me more about my attraction towards my girlfriends mother. The fact that she's 51 or the fact that she's also my mother.
translation: 我搞不清楚我被我女朋友的母亲吸引这件事让我更不安的是她51岁这件事，还是说她也是我的母亲这件事。<|im_end|>

joke: Today is National Pasta Day I have a friend that would have loved today, but sadly she's pastaway
translation: 今天是全国意大利面日，我有一个朋友会非常喜欢今天，但她遗憾地去世了。<|im_end|>

joke: Difference Between Good Girls And Bad Girls Good Girls Open Few Buttons In Hot Atmosphere, But Bad Girls Open All Buttons To Make The Atmosphere Hot.
translation: 好女孩和坏女孩的区别：好女孩在热的气氛中只会解开几个扣子，而坏女孩会解开所有的扣子来制造气氛。<|im_end|>

joke: I ate the last piece of flan that my wife and I have been fighting over I won the custardy battle.
translation: 我吃了最后那块我跟我老婆争来争去的蛋奶酥，我赢了这场滑腻腻的战争。<|im_end|>

joke: My entire day will be spent laughing at my children because they have to go back to school tomorrow..
translation: 我的一整天都会因为我的孩子们明天就要回去上学而嘲笑他们。<|im_end|>

joke: I think my wife has a habit of walking in her sleep Every morning I find her sleeping in someone else's bed.
translation: 我认为我的妻子有睡walk的习惯，每天早上我都能发现她睡在别人床上。<|im_end|>

joke: What is worse than biting through an apple, and finding a worm inside? ~~Rape~~ The picky fuckers on this website.
translation: 咬了一口苹果，发现里面有一条虫子，这种情况已经够糟糕了。但是这些网站上的挑剔分子们更让人心烦。<|im_end|>

joke: I couldn't afford to take my kids to Sea World. So I took them to our local fish market, saying, "Shhhh... they're all asleep."
translation: 我负担不起带孩子们去海洋世界，所以我就带他们去了当地的鱼市场，然后跟他们说：“嘘……它们都在睡觉。”<|im_end|>

joke: [first date] Me: *don't let him know you're the Mona Lisa* Him: You look nice tonight Me: *smiles ambiguously*
translation: （初次约会）我：*不要让他知道你就是蒙娜丽莎* 他：你今晚真漂亮 我：*微笑得模棱两可*<|im_end|>

joke: Dear Lord, Thank you for these noodles I'm about to eat and the good deal I got buying them in bulk at Costco. RA-MEN!
translation: 亲爱的主，感谢你赐予我即将享用的这些面条，还有我在Costco大量购买时得到的好 deal。真是方便面的恩典！<|im_end|>

joke: What did the tampon say to the other tampon? Nothing, they were both stuck up bitches.
translation: 卫生棉条对另一个卫生棉条说了什么？什么也没说，它们都是自以为是的家伙。<|im_end|>

joke: Did you hear the one about the perfume store? I heard their manufacturing was in an ol' factory.
translation: 听说过这个笑话吗？关于香水店的。我听说他们的生产线是在一个老工厂里。<|im_end|>

joke: I was going to major in cosmetology.. ..but then they shut down the space program.. idiots.
translation: 我本打算学习美容课程的……但是后来他们取消了太空计划……真是愚蠢。<|im_end|>

joke: I cant get on Tumblr anymore... My doctor told me to cut down on Trans-Fats
translation: 我不能再上Tumblr了……我的医生让我减少反式脂肪的摄入量。<|im_end|>

joke: What does Mr. Miyagi do when he gets home from a date? He wax off
translation: 宫崎先生约会回家后做什么？他把蜡烛吹灭。<|im_end|>

joke: So I asked this swiss dude to tell me something good about living in Switzerland. "Well" he said "the flag is a big plus!"
translation: 所以我问一个瑞士人，让他告诉我一件住在瑞士的好事。“嗯”，他说，“国旗是个很大的优点！”<|im_end|>

joke: Simon: I wrote a song Garfunkel: *reads lyrics* Garfunkel: "I am a rock. I am an island" dude I'm like right here. I thought we were friends
translation: 西蒙：我写了一首歌加芬克尔：（读了歌词）加芬克尔：“我是一块石头。我是一座孤岛。” 哥，我 right here（就在你身边），我还以为我们是朋友呢。<|im_end|>

joke: This year for Christmas.. This year for Christmas I got a new shirt and piece of ass from my wife. Figures, they were both too big!!
translation: 今年圣诞节，我从妻子那里得到了一件新衬衫和一段露水情缘。真是讽刺，它们都太大了！！<|im_end|>

joke: reckon the clouds look down and say, ''look! that one is shaped like an idiot?''
translation: 你以为云朵在上面看着说：“看！那个云朵的形状像个傻子？”<|im_end|>

joke: The best part of the birthday notifier on Facebook is, I meet people that I didn't even know were on my friends list.
translation: Facebook生日提醒最好的地方在于，我会遇到一些我甚至不知道他们在我好友列表里的人。<|im_end|>

joke: Why did the little Dutch boy have to register as a sex offender? He kept on sticking his finger in a tyke.
translation: 为什么那个荷兰小男孩必须登记为性犯罪者？因为他老是把手指伸进“堤”里。注：“tyke”有堤坝的意思，同时也指小孩，这里含有双关的意思。<|im_end|>

joke: After my surgery, the doctor told me I have to pee sitting down. He told me not to lift anything that weighs more than 10 pounds.
translation: 手术后医生告诉我得坐着小便，还让我不要搬动超过10磅重的东西。<|im_end|>

joke: My condolences for you and your family through this difficult transition is why my wife won't let me send back wedding RSVP cards.
translation: 我之所以不能退回婚礼回执卡，我妻子不让我这么做，是因为她在这段艰难时期的过渡中向你和你的家人表示哀悼。<|im_end|>

joke: "Only a good guy with a forest fire can prevent forest fires" - Smokey the NRA Bear
translation: “只有好人引发的森林火灾才能防止森林火灾”—— NRA熊先生烟熊<|im_end|>

joke: A man walks into a bar... He asks the barman "do you serve women here?" The barman replies "no, sorry, you'll have to bring your own."
translation: 一个男人走进一家酒吧……他问酒吧老板：“这里供应女人吗？”酒吧老板回答：“不，对不起，你得自带。”<|im_end|>

joke: I said to my dyslexic mate, "Guess which band has split up?" He said, "Erm..."
translation: 我对我的阅读障碍的朋友说：“猜猜哪个乐队解散了？”他说：“呃……”<|im_end|>

joke: Cleaning out the garage, I found some things I didn't even realize I had. Like a tent, a new printer, and a fourth kid.
translation: 清理车库时，我发现了一些甚至我自己都没意识到拥有的东西，比如一顶帐篷，一台新的打印机，还有一个第四孩子。<|im_end|>

joke: My penis is so polite..... .....it stands up to give ladies a place to sit down.
translation: 我的阴茎很有礼貌……它站起来给女士们让座。<|im_end|>

joke: Strip club[OC] So I'm at the strip club and this huge breasted woman comes up to me and slaps me silly with her left titty. Guy sitting next to me says,"bet that's gonna leave a lasting mammary."
translation: 所以我去了脱衣舞俱乐部，一个巨胸的女人走到我面前，用她的左胸使劲拍了我一下。坐在我旁边的人说：“这下肯定会在你身上留下深刻的印象。”<|im_end|>

joke: Did you hear the one about the dyslexic agnostic insomniac? He stays up all night wondering if dog exists.
translation: 听说过这样一个笑话吗？一个患有阅读障碍的不可知论者兼失眠症患者，他整晚都睡不着，怀疑狗是否存在。<|im_end|>

joke: Don't cut out part of your day to throw out clocks! It's a waste of time!
translation: 别把你的时间砍掉一部分来扔掉钟表！这真是浪费时间！<|im_end|>

joke: I witnessed a murder today.. then I realized it was just a group of crows.
translation: 今天我目睹了一起谋杀案……然后我意识到那只是群乌鸦。<|im_end|>

joke: BUSINESS IDEA: CinnaBon-Iver. Delicious pastries filled with scarf scraps and broken pieces of wind chimes.
translation: 生意点子：CinnaBon-Iver。美味的甜点，里面填满了围巾碎片和破旧的风铃碎片。<|im_end|>

joke: My girlfriend told me that having a good sense of humour is really important I told her to message the mods at /r/Jokes
translation: 我女朋友告诉我有个好的幽默感真的很重要，我告诉她可以去消息/r/Jokes板块的管理员。<|im_end|>

joke: My life would be a lot easier if when shopping online there was a "Sort by least ugly" option.
translation: 我的生活会轻松很多，如果在网上购物时有一个“按最不丑排序”的选项。<|im_end|>

joke: My girlfriend called me a pedophile. I said, "Wow, that's a pretty big word for a eight year old."
translation: 我女朋友说我是个恋童者。我说：“哇，八岁的孩子能说这么大的词。”<|im_end|>

joke: Confession: I'm the one who's been posting all those idiotic comments on youtube using millions of anonymous accounts.
translation: confession：我是那个用无数匿名账号在youtube上发表那些愚蠢评论的人。<|im_end|>

joke: [mouse plane] mouse pilot: hello folks, this is your captain squeaking- *mouse passengers squeal with delight*
translation: [老鼠飞机] 老鼠机长：大家好，这是你的机长吱吱- *老鼠乘客开心地尖叫起来*<|im_end|>

joke: If a white person eats a dessert and no one is around to Instagram it, did it even happen?
translation: 一个白人吃了甜点，但是周围没有人可以帮他发Instagram，这事情真的发生过吗？<|im_end|>

joke: Why does Michael J. Fox make the best milkshakes? Because he uses the finest ingredients, *asshole*.
translation: 迈克尔·J·福克斯做的奶昔最好喝，因为他使用最好的原料，*家伙*。<|im_end|>

joke: HOT SINGLES NEAR YOU BURNING SINGLES NEAR YOU 1ST DEGREE BURNED SINGLES NEAR YOU DEAD SINGLES NEAR YOU WHY DIDN'T YOU HELP
translation: 附近单身 情窦初开 附近单身 燃烧着 附近单身 一级烫伤 附近单身 死了 为什么你不帮忙<|im_end|>

joke: Waiter is there soup on the menu ? No madam I wiped it off !
translation: 服务员，菜单上有汤吗？ 没有夫人，我把它擦掉了！<|im_end|>

joke: Please don't put a coin on my mouth when I die; I plan to wander the shores of the River Styx for 100 years & finally get that bikini body.
translation: 别在我死后往我嘴里放硬币，我打算要在斯蒂克斯河的岸边徘徊100年，最后终于能拥有比基尼身材了。<|im_end|>

joke: You know you're too drunk to drive when... The tree you swerved for is actually the air-freshener.
translation: 当你试图躲避的其实是车内挂饰的时候，你就知道自己喝酒喝得不适合开车了。<|im_end|>

joke: Why are the labia on Japanese women oriented sideways instead of vertically? Goes better with their eyes.
translation: 为什么日本女性的外阴是横向的而不是纵向的？这样更搭配她们的眼睛。<|im_end|>

joke: When your 3yo spits a chewed up wad of cheese into your hand and you're like "where did you find this, I didn't give you any cheese today?"
translation: 当你的三岁小孩把嚼过的奶酪吐到你手心里，而你说“你从哪搞到这个的，今天我没给你吃过奶酪啊？”<|im_end|>

joke: I See your 7 year old jokes and I raise my own, What do you get when you cross the ocean with a Train Station? A Whale Way
translation: 我看穿了你七岁小孩级别的笑话，我也有一个：当你把海洋和火车站结合起来，你会得到什么？一个鲸鱼之路。<|im_end|>

joke: Why was the band late to their gig? Because the drummer locked himself in the car with the keys.
translation: 乐队为什么晚到了演出地点？因为鼓手把车钥匙锁在里面了。<|im_end|>

joke: After a dream I had last night, credits rolled. I had no idea so many people worked on those things.
translation: 在我昨晚做的一個夢結束時，畫面開始滾動字幕致謝。我完全不知道那些事情背后有那么多人在工作。<|im_end|>

joke: Cop: "Can you describe the person who robbed you?" Me: "He had on a black shirt and hat with a green apron and charged me $6 for coffee"
translation: 警察：“你能描述一下抢劫你的人吗？”我：“他穿着黑色上衣和帽子，系着绿色围裙，而且收了我六美元买咖啡。”描述：<|im_end|>

joke: A guy walked up to my bar. He said, "Can I have a stiff drink?" "Of course," I replied, cracking some Viagra pills into his whiskey.
translation: 一个男人走到我的酒吧前，他说：“我可以来一杯烈酒吗？”“当然可以，”我回答道，同时往他的威士忌里掺了一些万艾可药片。<|im_end|>

joke: The new fun way to tell if a celebrity is crazy is by how many times they delete and reactivate their Twitter account.
translation: 判断一位名人是否疯癫的新方法是看他们推特账号被删除又重新激活的次数。<|im_end|>

joke: remember: knives and alcohol don't mix. knives are solid they don't mix with anything. why where you trying to drink a knife anyways idiot
translation: 记得：刀和酒精不能混在一起。刀是固体，它们不会和其他东西混合。你为什么想喝刀呢，白痴？<|im_end|>

joke: Tourist in America I was going to take my wife to visit all the sites where they protested the police shooting of innocent black men. But i've only got 6 months...plus community service.
translation: 一个游客在美国说：我本打算带我妻子去参观所有抗议警察射杀无辜黑人事件的现场，但我只有六个月的时间……外加社区服务。<|im_end|>

joke: Q: Why couldn't the blonde write the number ELEVEN? A: Because she didn't know which one came first!
translation: 金发女郎为什么不会写数字十一？因为她不知道哪个一先写！<|im_end|>

joke: We could hit every terrorist on the Most Wanted List tomorrow, if we turned it over to Google's ad department.
translation: 如果我们把这件事交给谷歌的广告部门，我们明天就能击毙每一个通缉名单上的恐怖分子。<|im_end|>

joke: A Jewish girl.. ..asks her father, "Dad? Can I have 50 dollars?" he says, "40 dollars? What do you need 30 dollars for?"
translation: 一个犹太女孩问她爸爸：“爸爸，我可以有50美元吗？”他说：“40美元？你要30美元干什么？”<|im_end|>

joke: We're all born with scars. from the moment we open our eyes and look at the world we are wounded, we all share that same mark... Bellybuttons.
translation: 我们都带着伤痕出生。当我们睁开眼睛看着这个世界时，我们就已经受了伤，我们都带着同一个标记……肚脐。<|im_end|>

joke: How many hipsters does it take to change a lightbulb... It's quite an obscure number you probably would not have heard of it.
translation: 换一个灯泡需要多少hipster……那是一个相当冷门的数字，你可能没听说过。<|im_end|>

joke: The world is becoming too politically correct You can't even say black paint anymore, instead you have to say "Lamar can you please paint the fence".
translation: 世界变得太过政治正确了，你甚至不能说黑色的油漆了，而是要说“Lamar，你能把篱笆漆一下吗”。<|im_end|>

joke: *pulls out earbud* What? "We need to talk." *pulls out earbud* "You've been spending too much time at Chernobyl." *pulls out earbud* No way
translation: *拿出一个耳塞*什么？“我们需要谈谈。” *拿出另一个耳塞*“你花太多时间在切尔诺贝利了。” *摊手*不可能<|im_end|>

joke: Barbie comes with GI Joe She only fakes it with Ken. Saw plenty of pregnant Barbie jokes in this sub-reddit, but not this one.
translation: 芭比和GI乔在一起她只是和肯在一起时才装模作样。在这个 subreddit 上我见过很多关于怀孕的芭比的笑话，但没有见过这个。<|im_end|>

joke: The economy is doing really bad... Its so bad that when Bill and Hillary Clinton travel, they have to share a room.
translation: 经济状况很差……差到了当比尔和希拉里·克林顿出行时，他们不得不共用一个房间。<|im_end|>

joke: Why don't north Koreans listen to funk? Cos they've got no Seoul! Thank you very much.
translation: 为什么北 Koreans 不听 funk 音乐？因为他们没有 Seoul（首尔）！谢谢大家。<|im_end|>

joke: *LIGHTHOUSE* BATMAN - You call? L/HOUSE KEEPER - Shit, not again man. I am so sorry. BATMAN - Dead seagull on the light? LK -*Nods*
translation: *灯塔*蝙蝠侠 - 你在呼叫吗？ 灯塔管理员 - 操了，又来了。真的非常抱歉。 蝙蝠侠 - 灯上又有死海鸥了？ 灯塔管理员 - *点头*<|im_end|>

joke: I don't care if you don't like space puns. I like space puns. Comet me bro.
translation: 不在乎你是否喜欢太空梗，我就喜欢太空梗。和我一起来吧，兄弟。（彗星，来吧，兄弟。）<|im_end|>

joke: What did one deer say to the other after leaving the bar? I can't believe you just blew 50 bucks in there
translation: 一头鹿离开酒吧后对另一头鹿说：我无法相信你刚在里面花了50块钱。<|im_end|>

joke: My necrophiliac girlfriend told me I was dead to her. That is the nicest thing anyone has ever said to me.
translation: 我的恋尸癖女友告诉我她已经不在乎我了，那是任何人对我说过的最温柔的话了。<|im_end|>

joke: How many egoists does it take to change a lightbulb? One. They simply hold the bulb and wait for the world to revolve around them.
translation: 多少自私的人能换一个灯泡？一个就够了。他拿着灯泡，等着全世界围绕着他转。<|im_end|>

joke: I'm Winston Wolf, I fix problems. So I hear you're having a bad hair day.
translation: 我是温斯顿·沃尔夫，我解决问题。所以我听说你今天头发不太好？<|im_end|>

joke: What's the difference between a lentil and a chickpea? [NSFW] I wouldn't pay five hundred dollars to have a lentil on my face.
translation: 有什么区别一颗小扁豆和一颗鹰嘴豆？[不适合工作场合] 我不会花500美元把一颗小扁豆放在脸上。<|im_end|>

joke: Monday Morning......Rolling out of bed is easy. Getting up off  the floor is another story.
translation: 周一早上……从床上滚下来很容易，但從地上站起来就另当别论了。<|im_end|>

joke: What the hell is Minecraft? Hitler's lesser known, second, book about his love of knitting.
translation: 《我的世界》是什么鬼？那是希特勒不为人知的第二本书，讲述了他对于编织的热爱。<|im_end|>

joke: My girlfriend is half my size but takes up three quarters of the bed. If my math is correct, she's a bitch
translation: 我的女朋友體型只有我的一半大，但她卻佔了床上三分之二的地方。如果我的計算沒錯，她真是個 bitch（注：這裡的bitch有譴責意味，可翻譯為“ bitch / 倫理上的混蛋 / 倫理上的婊子”）<|im_end|>

joke: I like my women like I like my microwaves... Cold on the outside, warm on the inside, and willing and able to kill any baby I put inside them.
translation: 我喜欢女人就像我喜欢微波炉一样……外冷内热，而且愿意并且能够杀死我放进里面的东西。<|im_end|>

joke: What did Kurt Kobain have such a terrible time in 7th grade? He was having a mid-life crisis.
translation: 科特·科本为什么七年级的时候这么痛苦？他在经历中年危机。<|im_end|>

joke: 8: Daddy can we go to a haunted house tonight? Me: You spent the night at Grandmas last week. 8: What? Me: Nothing. 8: I'm telling mom.
translation: 8：爸爸今晚能带我去鬼屋吗？我：上周你不是在奶奶家住了一晚吗。8：什么？我：没什么。8：我要告诉妈妈。<|im_end|>

joke: What has two eyes but can't see, two wings but can't fly, and two legs but can't walk? A dead bird.
translation: 什么有两只眼睛却看不见，有两只翅膀却飞不起来，有两条腿却走不了？答案是：一只死鸟。<|im_end|>

joke: Oh, you want me to watch everything you have in less than the one-month free trial period? Challenge accepted, Netflix.
translation: 哦，你是说要在不到一个月的免费试用期内看完你所有的节目了？接受挑战，Netflix。<|im_end|>

joke: I think my professor might not know my name. He keeps on correcting it with the word "Late" on all my papers.
translation: 我认为我的教授可能不知道我的名字。他在我的所有论文上都用“Late”（迟到）这个词来纠正我。<|im_end|>

joke: Cutest thing I saw today was the dad angrily slamming the sliding door of his minivan but it slowed down by itself and latched silently
translation: 今天看到的最可爱的事情是一位爸爸生气地猛推他 minibuses 的滑动门，但门自己慢了下来，静静地锁住了。<|im_end|>

joke: I don't have a gf, but I do know a woman who in the car often asks where this is going so I show her the GPS & she gets mad for some reason.
translation: 我没有女朋友，但我确实认识一个女人，她经常在车上问我这是要去哪儿，我就给她看GPS，她不知道为什么就会生气。<|im_end|>

joke: it is hard to b scared of a angry person once u realize that they just wanted to tie a knot but insted of using string they used their arms
translation: 一个人生气的时候其实并不可怕，一旦你意识到他们只是想打结，但却用胳膊代替了绳子，这就没什么好怕的了。<|im_end|>

joke: What sound does a Chinese roller coaster make as it goes up an incline? chink chink chink chink
translation: 这个笑话的翻译是：“中国过山车上坡时是什么声音？叮叮当当”<|im_end|>

joke: A teacher walks into a bar Guy: can I buy you a drink? Teacher: I don't know, CAN you?
translation: 一个老师走进酒吧，一个男人说：“我可以请你喝一杯吗？”老师回答：“我不知道，你能请得起吗？”<|im_end|>

joke: When a cop pulls you over for a DUI at 2am on Friday night & tells you to walk the line-it's never good to start singing Johnny Cash songs.
translation: 当警察在周五凌晨2点因酒驾把你拦下，让你走直线，这时你最好不要开始唱约翰尼·卡什的歌。<|im_end|>

joke: A Latino shot an unarmed black man today, and everyone is in an uproar Especially the police, saying "They took our jobs!"
translation: 一个拉丁美洲人今天枪击了一名无武装的黑人，所有人都非常愤怒，尤其是警察，他们说：“他们抢走了我们的工作！”<|im_end|>

joke: [interview] Your resume says you have a "take no prisoners attitude". You know you are applying to be a corrections officer, right?
